creator: nityanarasimhan@yahoo.co.in

text:
I ran into a very similar situation where in EL i had the following:
Foo getFoo() 
Foo getFoo(Bar bar)

Such that ${bean.foo} would not work.

When I upgraded to newer HP hardware (and newer HP JVM (1.4.0.?? to 1.4.2.??) - 
this code broke. Being the lazy one I am - I was lucky to be able to remove Foo 
getFoo(Bar bar) from my code and my EL worked. So I never devled deeper for 
root cause.

Just an FYI.
creator: funkman@joedog.org
nityanarasimhan@yahoo.co.in
text:
I would also like to add another piece of information. 
This particular problem is only for this page. We are using similar 
collection "MODEL_YEAR" for other pages also. Its working fine for these pages 
in Solaris, Windows and HP-UX environments. This problem is only for this jsp.
I wonder if this is because of the indexed getter/setter along with normal 
getter/setter though I am not sure as to why (only with HP-UX).

creator: nityanarasimhan@yahoo.co.in
text:
I changed the indexed getter setter name for it to work in all environments. So 
that there is no overloading of getters setters.
